mapper.insert: insert into diagnostic_test_records (diag_test_id, diag_inspection_id, diag_test_status) values (#{diagTestId}, #{diagInspectionId}, #{diagTestStatus})

mapper.update: update diagnostic_test_records set diag_test_value = #{diagTestValue}, diag_test_status = 'DIAGNOSTIC_COMPLETED' where diag_test_record_id = #{diagTestRecordId}
